fields.description:
Description:
When buiding for Andorid emulator on Windows systems, the console will report the following:
[DEBUG] calling emulator kill on 2924
ERROR: The process "2924" not found.

The process ID will vary, and there seems to be no visible effect on the emulator launch. 

Steps to reproduce:
1) Launch Studio 1.0.8
2) Using a new or existing project in Studio, build for emulator
3) Watch the console output during the build

Result:
Console reports error

Expected:
No error reported

Notes:
This also occurs in 1.8.0.1
fields.summary: Android: tooling - Rhino/V8 - On windows systems during emulator build, console reports error attempting to kill emulator process
fields.environment:
OS: Windows 7, Windows XP
SDK: 1.8.1.v20120127113107
Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.8.201201262211

comments.body: This is no longer an issue with the new Android build.
Closing ticket as the issue cannot be reproduced and due to the above comments.
